# Optimize Your Brand for Generative AI Search

Monitor, analyze, and enhance your content's visibility across AI platforms like ChatGPT and Gemini. Stay ahead in the generative search era.

## Key Features and Learning Resources

- [Features](https://www.rankwit.ai/features): Explore the essential features that enhance your brand's visibility in generative AI search environments.
- [Learn](https://www.rankwit.ai/blog): Access educational resources to deepen your understanding of generative AI and its impact on search optimization.

## Frequently Asked Questions

- [FAQ](https://www.rankwit.ai/faq): Find answers to common questions regarding generative AI search and optimization strategies.

- [Last updated: April 28, 2025 Defining the Discipline: What Should We Call AI Search Optimization?](https://www.rankwit.ai/blog/naming-the-future-of-ai-visibility): An exploration of terminology and frameworks surrounding AI search optimization practices.
